    Exclusive Canyoning Experiences
    Scotland's Best Adventures

    Discover the Exclusive Experience of Private Canyoning

    More and more people are choosing to go private. Exclusive trips offer a unique, tailored adventure where every detail is focused on providing you with an unforgettable experience. Our approach to private trips is deeply personal and highly flexible, ensuring your adventure is crafted to perfectly align with your preferences. From planning to execution, we are dedicated to maximizing your enjoyment and making the most of your time in Scotland's breathtaking canyons.



    What our guests say

    Read these randomly selected reviews from recent adventures


    Who Will Love Private Canyoning?



    ☆ Families: A safe and exciting adventure for all ages.

    ☆ Couples and Groups: Create lasting memories with your loved ones.

    ☆ Individuals and Solo Travelers: Tailored experiences for personal discovery and adventure.

    Note: Guests must be over 18 years of age or accompanied by a parent or legal guardian.

    Photos From Our Recent Adventures


    Our photos illustrate why canyoning is one of the best adventure activities in Scotland. Whether it's your first time or if you are a seasoned adventurer, Scotland has an ideal canyoning location for everyone.

    Discover the excitement through these recent action shots from our adventures inlcuding...


    ★ Beginner group canyoning experiences near Edinburgh, Glasgow, and Fife,

    ★ Fun family canyoning adventures in Dollar Glen and across Scotland,

    ★ Wild, adrenaline-filled adventures in Perthshire and the Highlands,

    ★ Skills training and team building for all levels in Scotland's canyoning classroom,

    ★ Private trips for solo travellers, couples, or families,

    ★ Ideal adventure activity experiences for groups, team building, stag, and hen parties.

    On your adventure we'll happily take as many photos for you as you like, sharing them straight after the trip.


    Scroll through using the arrows and click on the photo to expand

    Your Adventure at a Glance

    ☆ Duration

    Choose from a half-day adventure lasting 4 hours or a full-day experience spanning 6 to 8 hours, complete with a delightful picnic lunch.


    ☆ A Warm Welcome

    Start your adventure with a friendly welcome. Your guide will show you the canyoning gear, chat about staying safe, and happily answer all your questions, getting you all set for the exciting action ahead.


    ☆ Smart Preparation

    Get a head start on your canyoning adventure by learning and practicing essential skills in a safe setting. We'll dedicate time to teach or brush up on the necessary techniques before we begin our descent. This approach not only boosts confidence but also ensures we all enjoy the thrills safely.


    ☆ Adventure Awaits

    In all our adventures, we'll take you through breathtaking waterfalls and wild swimming pools, unveiling the canyon's natural beauty with each step. We'll clearly outline the upcoming obstacles and encourage you to apply your skills to meet the challenges. Throughout, we'll support you in making well-informed decisions, ensuring you have the most rewarding and enjoyable experience possible.


    ☆ Time to Chill and Chat

    Wrap up your adventure with some homemade snacks and drinks back where we started. It's the perfect time to relive the day's best bits, share some laughs, and check out the photos from our unforgettable journey.

    Discover the Thrill of Canyoning in Scotland's Top Locations


    From the rugged, sandstone cliffs of Ardessie Falls in the North to the cascading beauty of Gray Mare's Tail in the West, each canyon offers a unique adventure. Whether it's exploring the ancient volcanic gorges of Alva and Dollar Glen or embracing the adrenaline rush at Bruar's famous jumping spots, Scotland's diverse canyons are perfect for canyoning enthusiasts of all skill levels.

    Check Live Availability and Book Your Canyoning Adventure


    Available throughout the year, our private canyoning experiences can be tailored to your schedule. Contact us anytime to start planning your adventure. We offer guidance on weather conditions and assist in selecting the ideal canyon location for your experience. For added convenience, our local pickup service ensures easy access to your canyoning adventure. For our most popular canyons, check live availability and easily book your preferred date online.



    For families and groups larger than 6, or for more information on our pickup service, please reach out to us directly to discuss availability and options.



    Ready to explore? Click a date in the calendar to book your adventure online now!

    ★★★★★
    Our Five Star Service

    Discover some of the aspects that help make our adventures truly unforgettable:


    ★ Personalised Advice and Support: Before you book we like to offer personalised advice and answer any questions you may have. Our information and booking office can be contacted every day for any request. We want to make sure that you are going to book the experience that is right for you. We'd love to hear from you! Give us a call, send us an email or message us on whatsapp.


    ★ Premium Equipment: We place utmost importance on your safety and comfort.That's why we provide only the highest quality equipment for all our adventures. Our gear, is meticulously maintained and regularly updated to ensure the best possible experience. By using premium equipment, we enhance your safety, comfort, and enjoyment, allowing you to focus fully on the thrill and beauty of your canyoning adventure in Scotland.


    ★ Our Commitment to Safety: If it isn't safe we won't do it. We practise regularly to maintain the highest standards, first aid training and incident management. We understand that every adventure is unique, and our approach to safety reflects that. Heightened awareness and skillful observations are fundamental to our operations, skills honed through years of experience. We prioritise constant vigilance, as safety is a non-negotiable aspect of all our activities. To ensure the highest safety standards, our guides regularly undergo specialised training, tailored to both the specific location and activity. This commitment to safety is grounded in up-to-date and relevant expertise, ensuring the best possible experience for our guests.


    ★ How We Measure Success: Our success is gauged by the satisfaction of our guests. This is why we specialize in small groups and private trips. With fewer numbers, we're able to fully focus on planning and executing adventures that are just right for you. Our passion for what we do drives us to ensure you enjoy the experience as much as we do! By focusing on guest satisfaction, we aim to foster a positive impact across the entire industry. Exceptional service leads to happy guests, enhancing the value of what we offer. This approach benefits all who strive for excellence. We embrace collaborations with other professionals and businesses that share our ethos and are passionate about their work.


    ★ Local Pick-Up: Your convenience matters to us. If you don't have transport, we'll arrange a local pick-up and drop-off for your trip, making your journey hassle-free. This service is complimentary for private trips.

    Using our 7-seater vehicle:

    ★ For Full Day Private Adventures: If requested, we'll pick you up en route and drop you off on the way home. We'll extend the journey to your accommodation anywhere within a 30-mile radius of the meeting point.

    ★ For Half Day Private Adventures: If requested, we'll arrange for a pick-up and drop-off at your accommodation within a 15-mile radius of the meeting point.

    ★ For Shared Adventures: If you ask us for help getting to the meeting point, we'll advise on public transport options and help you with a pick-up from the nearest town or village.

    ★ For Larger Groups & Longer Transfers: We'll happily recommend the best and most trusted local options for a seamless journey.
